Specimen Type: Extracted genomic DNA from patient specimens
Purpose: To identify clinically relevant genetic variants associated with hereditary conditions using a targeted next-generation sequencing gene panel.
Container: DNA microcentrifuge tube (post-extraction; original specimen container not specified)
Equipment: Spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), fluorometer (e.g., Qubit), electrophoresis system (e.g., TapeStation), NGS sequencer, and bioinformatics pipeline
